mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.content AS "content", a.post_id AS "postId", a.main_id AS "postMain.id", pm.subject AS "postMain.subject", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", u.photo AS "createBy.photo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.ptp_id AS "ptpId"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN post_main pm ON a.main_id = pm.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post( id, content, post_id, main_id, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, ptp_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{content}, #{postId}, #{postMain.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{ptpId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET content = #{content}, post_id = #{postId}, main_id = #{postMain.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, ptp_id = #{ptpId} WHERE id = #{id}
